document_data.name: Paramyr Bladerunner
document_data.mainbody: '''Paramyr Bladerunner''' was a male [[human]] [[fighter]] and an agent of [[Zhentil Keep]] based in the town of [[Thunderstone]] in [[Cormyr]] around [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Description: In his early 30s, he was handsome with a square jaw.
document_data.Personality: Paramyr was arrogant but disciplined and utterly dedicated to the service of Zhentil Keep.
document_data.Activities: Paramyr led a contingent of six Zhentish soldiers quartered in Thunderstone at the time, though he tried to keep his secret mission a secret. They were well-equipped for all manner of fighting.
document_data.Possessions: Paramyr wielded a ''+2 [[longsword]]'' and wore ''+2 [[chainmail]]''. He also possessed a ''[[ring of spell turning]]'' and an ''[[figurine of wondrous power|ivory goat figurine]]'', and rode a light [[warhorse]].
